XMLRPC Server Usage¶

Once the service is up and running the XMLRPC server does the following operations:

  • continuosly listens to requests coming from XMLRPC client
  • polls the DB schema and acts the scheduled event agains selected GPIO pins

RPC functions available for RPC client¶

class servergpio.ServerFuncts[source]¶
checkServer()[source]¶

check XMLRPC server service status

Returns:string
Return type:json
getGPIOStatus()[source]¶

get current PIN Status :returns: string :rtype: json

getTemperature()[source]¶

check XMLRPC server RPI Internal temp

Returns:string
Return type:json
setGPIO(gpio)[source]¶

set GPIO pin to status value and update DB.

Parameters:gpio (list) – list of Dictionary in the form: {‘gpio’:pinid,status:’ON|OFF’,’modifier’:userid} 
>>> setGPIO([{'gpio':5,'status':'ON','modifier':'ippolf'},{'gpio':6,'status':'OFF','modifier':'ippolf'}])
